summary: A bright satirical comedy about an innocent high school girl granted her wishes by a student prodigy. A broad satire of teenage culture in the sixties, its targets ranging from progressive education to beach movies.
cast: Roddy McDowall|Tuesday Weld|Lola Albright|Martin West|Ruth Gordon|Harvey Korman|Sarah Marshall|Lynn Carey|Donald Murphy|Max Showalter|Joseph Mell|Dan Frazer|Martine Bartlett|Jo Collins|Judith Loomis|Gay Gordon|Vicki London|David Draper|Phyllis Davis|Jo Anne Loren|Jeri Lynn Frazer|Bobbie Hefley|Donald Foster|Laurie Mitchell|Peter Adams|Benjie Bancroft|Roberta Collins|Robert Foulk|Martin Gabel|John Roy
title: Todo por amor
